data.name: ThrowHelper_ServiceConfDocumentMustContainSchemaDef
data.value: The service configuration must contain a schema definition.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ServiceConfNoClientsSpecified
data.value: There are no clients and capabilities specified in the service configuration.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ServiceConfNoTypesSpecified
data.value: The service configuration does not specify any clients.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ServiceConfInvalidValue
data.value: Expected a value of type `{0}` but found the value `{1}` of type `{2}`.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ServiceConfInvalidDirectiveName
data.value: Expected a directive with the name `{0}` but found a directive with the name `{1}`.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ServiceConfNoDirectiveArgs
data.value: The directive `{0}` has required arguments but non were provided.

data.name: ThrowHelper_ServiceConfInvalidDirectiveArgs
data.value: Expected arguments for the directive `{0}` are `{1}`. The service configuration reader found the following arguments `{2}` on the directive in line number {3}.

data.name: FusionGraphConfigurationReader_ReadResolverDefinition_InvalidKindValue
data.value: The kind must be of the values query, batch, batchByKey or subscription.

data.name: FusionRequestExecutorBuilderExtensions_AddFusionGatewayServer_NoSchema
data.value: A valid service configuration must always produce a schema document.

data.name: ThrowHelper_Requirement_Is_Missing
data.value: The variable value `{0}` was not provided but is required.

data.name: ThrowHelper_NoResolverInContext
data.value: There must be a field resolver definition in this context!

data.name: TransportConfigurationNotSupported
data.value: Transport configuration not supported.

data.name: CreateSelection_MustBePlaceholderOrSelectExpression
data.value: Either provide a placeholder or the select expression must be a FieldNode.

data.name: GatewayConfigurationFileObserver_FileNameNullOrEmpty
data.value: Value cannot be null or empty.

data.name: FileConfigurationSession_MustContainPath
data.value: The file name must contain a directory path.

data.name: ExecutionState_RegisterState_StateImmutable
data.value: The state for the selection set `{0}` is immutable.

data.name: ExecutionNodeBuilderMiddleware_CreateResolveByKeyBatchNode_StateInconsistent
data.value: The state is inconsistent.

data.name: ResolveNode_EntityResolver_Already_Registered
data.value: The entity resolver for the specified type name was already registered.

data.name: ThrowHelper_UnableToCreateQueryPlan_Message
data.value: It seems as if the query plan builder was not able to create a query plan for the specified query as not all execution steps have been completed.

data.name: ThrowHelper_NoRootNode_Message
data.value: In order to build a query plan a root node must be set.

data.name: ThrowHelper_Node_ReadOnly_Message
data.value: The execution node is read-only.

data.name: ThrowHelper_UnableToLoadConfiguration_Message
data.value: Unable to load the Fusion gateway configuration.

data.name: ThrowHelper_NoConfigurationProvider_Message
data.value: No configuration provider registered.

data.name: ThrowHelper_QueryAndMutationMustExecute_Message
data.value: A query or mutation execution plan can not be executed as a subscription.

data.name: ThrowHelper_SubscriptionsMustSubscribe_Message
data.value: A subscription execution plan can not be executed as a query.

data.name: ThrowHelper_RequestFormatter_SelectionSetEmpty_Message
data.value: A selection set must not be empty.

data.name: ThrowHelper_RequestFormatter_ArgumentVariableExpected_Message
data.value: The variable must be an argument variable.

data.name: DefaultIdParser_ParseTypeName_InvalidFormat
data.value: Unable to decode the node id value.
